summary: When an evil magma demon and his minions steals the sun of a magical world, the new guardians of both the sun and the moon must embark on a quest to retrieve it and save their world from disaster as the moon faces destruction as well.
cast: Omar Sy|Izïa Higelin|Michaël Grégorio|Shafik Ahmad|Benoît Allemane|Shannon Archie|Féodor Atkine|Joshua J. Ballard|Damien Boisseau|Emmanuel Curtil|Sophie de Fürst|Trevor Devall|Michael Dobson|Paul Dobson|Paolo Domingo|Jean-Claude Donda|Patrice Dozier|Brian Drummond|Jeff Dunham|Sébastien Faglain|Davey Grant|Catherine Griffoni|Alexandre Heboyan|Ed Helms|Eric Herson-Macarel|Thierry Jahn|Jade Jonot|Fabrice Josso|Zina Khakhoulia|Riley Kramer|Jonathan Love|Rob Lowe|Michel Mella|Sally Noble|Patton Oswalt|Patrick Poivey|Nicole Provost|Patrick Préjean|Marie-Christine Robert|Edouard Rouland|Rob Shields|Christian Slater|Sam Vincent
keywords: disaster|astronomical object in title|good versus evil|demon
title: Mune, le gardien de la lune
